metadata.description: The location in which the data collection rules and data collection endpoints should be deployed.
Log analytics workspace name. Can be found under Log analytics "Settings".
Enter Base URL starting with "https://" followed by hostname (Ex: https://scout.cymru.com)
Select Authentication Type for Team Cymru Scout APIs. Default is 'Basic Auth'
Enter the username for Team Cymru Scout account. Required if Authentication Type is Basic Auth
Enter the password for Team Cymru Scout account. Required if Authentication Type is Basic Auth
Enter the API Key for Team Cymru Scout account. Required if Authentication Type is API Key
Enter comma separated ip values for which data should be collected (Example: 1.2.3.4,10.20.30.40,2.4.3.6)
Enter comma separated domain values for which data should be collected (Example: abc.com,xyz.com,def.ai)
Select the type of API to collect data for IP. Default is Foundation
Enter Azure Client Id that you have created during app registration
Enter Azure Client Secret that you have created during creating the client secret
Enter Tenant Id of your Microsoft Entra ID
Enter Object id of your Microsoft Entra App
Enter name of the table used to store IP Data logs. Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error
Enter name of the table used to store Domain Data logs. Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error
Enter name of the table used to store Account Usage Data logs. Please do not keep this field as empty else you will get validation error
Enter a valid Quartz Cron-Expression. The default value is every day at midnight(00:00) for ip and domain data collection.
Enter a valid Quartz Cron-Expression. The default value is every hour for Account usage.
Add log level or log severity value. Default is 'INFO'

Migrate Classic Application Insights to Log Analytic Workspace which is retiring by 29 Febraury 2024. Use 'Log Analytic Workspace-->Properties' blade having 'Resource ID' property value. This is a fully qualified resourceId which is in format '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/{workspaceName}'

properties.description: Data collection endpoint for ingestion api

dataFlows.transformKql:
source
| extend TimeGenerated = todatetime(now()), json_identity=parse_json(identity), json_whois=parse_json(whois), json_usage=parse_json(usage), json_open_ports = parse_json(open_ports), json_communications=parse_json(communications), json_pdns=parse_json(pdns), json_fingerprints=parse_json(fingerprints), json_x509=parse_json(x509)
| extend identity_tags=todynamic(json_identity.tags), identity_reverse_hostnames=todynamic(json_identity.reverse_hostnames), identity_asn=toreal(json_identity.asn), identity_as_name=tostring(json_identity.as_name), identity_net_name=tostring(json_identity.net_name), identity_org_name=tostring(json_identity.org_name), whois_asn=toreal(json_whois.asn), whois_modified=tostring(json_whois.modified), whois_cidr=tostring(json_whois.cidr), whois_as_name=tostring(json_whois.as_name), whois_bgp_asn=toreal(json_whois.bgp_asn), whois_bgp_asn_name=tostring(json_whois.bgp_asn_name), whois_net_name=tostring(json_whois.net_name), whois_net_handle=tostring(json_whois.net_handle), whois_admin_contact_person=tostring(json_whois.admin_contact_person), whois_admin_contact_email=tostring(json_whois.admin_contact_email), whois_admin_contact_phone=tostring(json_whois.admin_contact_phone), whois_admin_contact_country=tostring(json_whois.admin_contact_country), whois_tech_contact_phone=tostring(json_whois.tech_contact_phone), whois_tech_contact_country=tostring(json_whois.tech_contact_country), whois_tech_contact_city=tostring(json_whois.tech_contact_city), whois_tech_contact_address=tostring(json_whois.tech_contact_address), whois_org_id=tostring(json_whois.org_id), whois_org_name=tostring(json_whois.org_name), whois_org_email=tostring(json_whois.org_email), whois_org_phone=tostring(json_whois.org_phone), whois_org_country=tostring(json_whois.org_country), whois_org_city=tostring(json_whois.org_city), whois_org_address=tostring(json_whois.org_address), whois_mnt_by_email=tostring(json_whois.mnt_by_email), whois_mnt_lower_email=tostring(json_whois.mnt_lower_email), whois_mnt_router_email=tostring(json_whois.mnt_router_email), communications_event_count=toreal(json_communications.event_count), pdns_event_count=toreal(json_pdns.event_count), fingerprints_event_count=toreal(json_fingerprints.event_count), open_ports_event_count=toreal(json_open_ports.event_count), open_ports_unique_ports=toreal(json_open_ports.unique_ports), x509_event_count=toreal(json_x509.event_count), usage_used_queries=toreal(json_usage.used_queries), usage_remaining_queries=toreal(json_usage.remaining_queries), usage_query_limit=toreal(json_usage.query_limit), usage_foundation_api_usage_used_queries=toreal(json_usage.foundation_api_usage.used_queries), usage_foundation_api_usage_remaining_queries=toreal(json_usage.foundation_api_usage.remaining_queries), usage_foundation_api_usage_query_limit=toreal(json_usage.foundation_api_usage.query_limit), usage_ai_insights_usage_used_queries=toreal(json_usage.ai_insights_usage.used_queries), usage_ai_insights_usage_remaining_queries=toreal(json_usage.ai_insights_usage.remaining_queries), usage_ai_insights_usage_query_limit=toreal(json_usage.ai_insights_usage.query_limit)

source
| extend TimeGenerated = todatetime(now())
| extend TimeGenerated = todatetime(now()), json_insights=parse_json(insights)
| extend insights_overall_rating=tostring(json_insights.overall_rating), insights_insights=todynamic(json_insights.insights)
| project-away insights, json_insights

source
| extend TimeGenerated = todatetime(now())
| extend json_summary = parse_json(summary)
| extend summary_last_seen = tostring(json_summary.last_seen), summary_whois_asn = toreal(json_summary.whois.asn), summary_whois_as_name=tostring(json_summary.whois.as_name), summary_whois_net_name=tostring(json_summary.whois.net_name), summary_whois_org_name = tostring(json_summary.whois.org_name), summary_comms_total=toreal(json_summary.comms_total), summary_service_counts = tostring(json_summary.service_counts), summary_open_ports = tostring(json_summary.open_ports), summary_pdns = tostring(json_summary.pdns), summary_certs = tostring(json_summary.certs), summary_fingerprints = tostring(json_summary.fingerprints), summary_top_peers=tostring(json_summary.top_peers)
| project-away summary, json_summary

source
| extend TimeGenerated = todatetime(now())
| extend json_ai_insights_usage = parse_json(ai_insights_usage), json_foundation_api_usage = parse_json(foundation_api_usage)
| extend ai_insights_usage_used_queries = toreal(json_ai_insights_usage.used_queries), ai_insights_usage_remaining_queries =toreal(json_ai_insights_usage.remaining_queries), ai_insights_usage_query_limit = toreal(json_ai_insights_usage.query_limit), foundation_api_usage_used_queries = toreal(json_foundation_api_usage.used_queries), foundation_api_usage_remaining_queries = toreal(json_foundation_api_usage.remaining_queries), foundation_api_usage_query_limit= toreal(json_foundation_api_usage.query_limit)
| project-away ai_insights_usage, foundation_api_usage, json_ai_insights_usage, json_foundation_api_usage

| extend local_as_info=todynamic(json_local.as_info), local_ip=tostring(json_local.ip), local_min_port=toreal(json_local.min_port), local_max_port=toreal(json_local.max_port), local_country_codes=todynamic(json_local.country_codes), local_tags=todynamic(json_local.tags), local_unique_ports=toreal(json_local.unique_ports), local_top_services=todynamic(json_local.top_services), peer_ip=tostring(json_peer.ip), peer_as_info=todynamic(json_peer.as_info), peer_min_port=toreal(json_peer.min_port), peer_max_port=toreal(json_peer.max_port), peer_country_codes=todynamic(json_peer.country_codes), peer_tags=todynamic(json_peer.tags), peer_unique_ports=toreal(json_peer.unique_ports), peer_top_services=todynamic(json_peer.top_services)
| project-away json_local, json_peer, local, peer

source
| extend TimeGenerated = todatetime(now()), json_whois=parse_json(whois), json_pdns=parse_json(pdns), json_fingerprints=parse_json(fingerprints), json_open_ports=parse_json(open_ports), json_tag_timeline=parse_json(tag_timeline), json_insights=parse_json(insights)
| extend whois_asn=toreal(json_whois.asn), whois_as_name=tostring(json_whois.as_name), whois_net_name=tostring(json_whois.net_name), whois_org_name=tostring(json_whois.org_name), pdns_total=toreal(json_pdns.total), open_ports_total=toreal(json_open_ports.total), open_ports_unique_ports=toreal(json_open_ports.unique_ports), tag_timeline_data=todynamic(json_tag_timeline.data), insights_overall_rating=tostring(json_insights.overall_rating), insights_total=toreal(json_insights.total), insights_insights=todynamic(json_insights.insights)
| project-away whois, json_whois, pdns, json_pdns, fingerprints, json_fingerprints, open_ports, json_open_ports, tag_timeline, json_tag_timeline, insights, json_insights
